introduction: If you've been invited to take a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course, you can search course availability online. You'll then have to book directly with the course provider
more_information:
^You can only take a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course if you've got a letter inviting you to take a course.^

You’ll need your driving licence number to log in and see availability online.

There are several different courses under the scheme. Check the letter you got to find out what course you can take.

As well as course availability you can see prices, but this is just a guideline - the course provider sets the final price. Contact them to book and pay for a course.
